meanings.definition: A tropical fruit native to South America.
meanings.sent1: The lucuma was sweet and delicious.
meanings.sent2: I tried a lucuma for the first time today.
meanings.sent3: The lucuma rolled off the table and surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a lucuma in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the ripe lucuma filled the room.

meanings.definition: The tree that produces the lucuma fruit.
meanings.sent1: The lucuma tree provided shade on hot days.
meanings.sent2: We planted a lucuma in our backyard.
meanings.sent3: The lucuma tree waved its branches in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The lucuma tree stood tall like a guardian of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the lucuma tree rustled in the breeze.
